name: nugetversioning
description: Tool used to resolve Nuget package version in csproj file
author: Eddy R.
instanceNameFormat: Resolve project package versions with lastest $(versionToTarget) version

inputs.name: pathToProjects
inputs.label: Path to project(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search `.csproj` file that contains package references to resolve

inputs.name: pathToNugetConfig
inputs.label: Path to NuGet.Config
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search `NuGet.Config` file that contains package sources in use

inputs.name: versionToTarget
inputs.label: Version to target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines how to resolve package version number

options.stable or prerelease: Find lastest stable or prerelease version

inputs.name: logVerbosity
inputs.label: Log verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines how to resolve package version number : stable or prerelease
